title: Name of Department and Title of Minister) Order 2020 (S.I. No. 408 of 2020)),
heading: 1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the Planning and Development
text_raw:
1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the Planning and Development 

(Amendment) (No. 2) Regulations 2021. 

(2) These Regulations shall be included in the collective citation the Planning 

and Development Regulations 2001 to 2021. 

Appliances, apparatus and structures suitable for being licensed
text_norm: 1 (1) regulation may cited planning development (amendment) (no 2) regulation 2021 (2) regulation shall included collective citation planning development regulation 2001 2021 appliance apparatus structure suitable licensed

title: Name of Department and Title of Minister) Order 2020 (S.I. No. 408 of 2020)),
heading: 2. The Planning and Development Regulations 2001 (S.I. No 600 of 2001) are
text_raw:
2. The Planning and Development Regulations 2001 (S.I. No 600 of 2001) are 

amended in article 201 by inserting after paragraph (b) the following paragraph: 

“(ba) Awnings, coverings, canopies, parasols, shades, windbreakers, 
heaters or other similar structure for the purpose of facilitating 
outdoor dining where tables and chairs are being provided under 
paragraph (b),”. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

30 April, 2021. 

DARRAGH O’BRIEN, 

Minister for Housing, Local Government and Heritage. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 4th May, 2021. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [210] 3
